title: Chicken & Rice Bowl
steps: Cook rice according to package instructions.
Season and pan-fry chicken until cooked through.
Mix chicken with soy sauce and serve over rice with steamed veggies.

title: Chicken Stir-Fry
steps: Cut chicken into cubes and season lightly.
Stir-fry garlic and chicken in hot oil until golden.
Add broccoli and soy sauce, cook until tender-crisp.

title: One-Pan Chicken & Veggies
steps: Toss chopped chicken and veggies with oil and seasoning.
Roast on a sheet pan at 200°C until cooked through.
Serve hot.

title: Tomato Pasta
steps: Cook pasta until al dente.
Sauté garlic in olive oil, add chopped tomatoes and simmer.
Toss pasta with sauce and serve.

title: Fried Rice
steps: Use cold cooked rice for best texture.
Scramble eggs in the pan, set aside.
Stir-fry veggies, add rice and soy sauce, fold eggs back in.

title: Veggie Omelette
steps: Beat eggs with a splash of milk.
Sauté veggies until soft, add egg mixture and cook until set.
Fold and serve.

title: Grilled Cheese
steps: Butter the bread slices, place cheese between them.
Grill on a pan until golden and cheese melts.
Serve immediately.

title: Tuna Salad
steps: Mix drained tuna with mayo and chopped celery.
Serve over lettuce or with bread.

title: Pancakes
steps: Mix flour, milk, and egg to a batter.
Fry small pancakes in butter until golden on both sides.
Serve with syrup or fruit.

title: Quick Veggie Stir-Fry
steps: Heat oil and sauté garlic.
Add veggies and stir-fry until tender-crisp.
Finish with soy sauce and serve with rice or noodles.

title: Tofu Stir-Fry
steps: Press tofu and cut into cubes.
Pan-fry tofu until golden, set aside.
Stir-fry veggies and garlic, add tofu back with soy sauce, cook until done.

title: Lentil & Vegetable Curry
steps: Sauté onion and garlic in oil.
Add curry powder, lentils, and coconut milk.
Add tomato and simmer until lentils are tender.
Serve with rice or bread.

title: Grilled Fish with Lemon
steps: Brush fish with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
Grill or pan-fry fish until cooked through (about 5-7 min per side).
Squeeze fresh lemon juice and serve.
